featured.text: After the war, a giant paperclip statue was erected in Oslo to 40 Vaaler—even though his design was never actually manufactured.

definition.zh_def: 挪威的首都，位於該國東南部，著名的文化和經濟中心。
definition.en_def: The capital of Norway, located in the southeastern part of the country, known for its cultural and economic significance.
definition.example: Oslo is famous for its museums and green spaces.
